name: Lius Philipps, color needs a mission, 2022
description:
Lius Philipps 
german contemporary artist.
year of creation: 2022
medium: you and me

I am a citizen of Babel. 
Seeking to speak, evolving to understand, to own my own.

This is the presence of an unprecedented future, a deconstruction of a fluent mind, an ever willing creature. This is my breath. Reset your mind, open console to reenter.
